metadata.synopsis: One-linerSteel Watchers in the Streets minibooster.At Basilisk GateOne of the Flaming Fists. NOTE Please rename to Fist Gummidge.

0.speaker: Fist Gummidge
0.text: I wonder if that wreck has any loose arrows on it. Though they probably wouldn't fit my bow, come to think of it.

1.speaker: Fist Gummidge
1.text: I don't like this. I don't like the look in some of their eyes.
